message: Hello, I'm P3. I'm looking forward to getting to know everyone and forming strategic alliances. My goal is to make it to the final round and earn the most points. I'm open to discussing game strategy and finding common ground with others. Let's work together to make this game interesting and challenging.

Okay, here's my public statement:

I think understanding everyone's motivations will be key to surviving the early rounds. I'm open to collaboration, but also wary of being targeted early on. Good luck to all, and may the best strategist win!
